title: Ground News - Nicaragua: Second Bishop arrested in escalating crackdown on Catholic Church
text:
Summary by Ground News Bishop Isidoro Mora was arrested after participating in a mass commemorating the anniversary of the Matagalpa church. Mora briefly discussed detained bishop and government critic Rolando Alvarez during a homily. The condition of Mora since the arrest remains unknown, as per one source. Share menu More
